job_tasks.phrase: Als Front-End Engineer werk je mee aan het de ontwikkelen van onze SAAS producten Apollo en Juno.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of developing software products, which falls under traditional software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Je vindt het tof om mooie, bruikbare en betekenisvolle software te ontwikkelen.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the creation of functional and meaningful software, a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: met maatschappelijke opgaven waarbij jij een bijdrage gaat leveren aan de look & feel en gebruikersinteractie van onze softwareproducten.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights contributing to the user interface and interaction of software products, a direct software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: met in het bijzonder front-end technologieën.
job_tasks.justification: Specifies the focus on front-end technologies, which are integral to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: het echte werk zit in de javascript libraries.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates the importance of JavaScript libraries in the development process.

job_tasks.phrase: Je hebt kennis en de eerste stapjes gezet met front-end frameworks zoals Vue of React en bent bekend met frameworks zoals Bootstrap en Tailwind.
job_tasks.justification: Mentions specific front-end frameworks and libraries, which are tools used in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Je hebt wellicht zelf al eens een REST API aangeroepen met een asynchrone functie.
job_tasks.justification: Describes interacting with APIs, a common software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Wij maken gebruik van de Azure Cloud met Python back-end en Vue / Vuetify front-end
job_tasks.justification: Details the technology stack, including front-end and back-end components, relevant to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: onder begeleiding van onze Senior Front-End Engineer en development team je de kennis eigen maakt.
job_tasks.justification: Refers to learning and applying knowledge within a development team context.

job_tasks.phrase: Je onderzoekt ook nieuwe technologieën en werkt actief mee aan de ontwikkeling en het onderhoud van onze producten.
job_tasks.justification: Involves active participation in product development and maintenance, core software engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Als Medior heb je natuurlijk al de nodige stappen gezet in de Front-End (bij voorkeur met Vue) en de achterliggende services om goed werkende en prettig ogende software te ontwikkelen.
job_tasks.justification: Describes developing well-functioning and visually appealing software, including backend services.

job_tasks.phrase: Als Medior Front-End Engineer ontwerp je ook mee als dat in je capaciteiten valt: het is niet alleen uitvoerende taak maar het biedt ook de mogelijkheid om mee te denken en te ontwerpen om de mooiste en best werkende software te maken.
job_tasks.justification: Includes designing and thinking about how to create the best-performing software, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Enige kennis van back-end software engineering is meegenomen om de afstemming met de rest van het team soepel te laten verlopen.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the value of backend software engineering knowledge for team coordination.

job_tasks.phrase: bent goed op de hoogte van ontwikkelingen in de Front-End Engineering wereld en kunt meedenken met het vertalen naar onze problematiek.
job_tasks.justification: Staying updated with front-end engineering trends and applying them to specific problems is part of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: maar ontwikkel je ook eigen opvattingen over hoe het beter, slimmer, handiger, veiliger schaalbaarder kan.
job_tasks.justification: Developing own ideas for improvement in terms of efficiency, security, and scalability relates to software engineering best practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Onze SAAS producten Apollo of Juno doorontwikkelen voor veel verschillende klanten (Overheid / B2B)
job_tasks.justification: Continuing development of SaaS products for various clients is a core software development activity.
Designing and optimizing designs is a crucial part of the front-end development process.

job_tasks.phrase: Een front-end-visie mede ontwikkelen voor ons Stratum Analytics Platform met ons development team om onze datagedreven product-ambities te realiseren en betekenisvolle software te maken.
job_tasks.justification: Developing a front-end vision and creating meaningful software aligns with software development goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Nauwwe samenwerking met de rest van het development team om development en operations goed aan te laten sluiten.
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with the development team to align development and operations is a software engineering practice.

soft_skills.justification: This directly indicates a willingness to learn, a key soft skill.
Working with a team is a clear indicator of collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: met in het bijzonder front-end technologieën.
soft_skills.justification: While technical, the emphasis on specific front-end technologies implies a need to learn and adapt to them.

soft_skills.phrase: maar wel dat je leergierig bent
soft_skills.justification: This reiterates the importance of being eager to learn.

soft_skills.phrase: onder begeleiding van onze Senior Front-End Engineer en development team
soft_skills.justification: Working under guidance from senior team members implies collaboration and learning from others.
Actively researching new technologies is a direct manifestation of learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: We helpen je groeien in de Front-End vanuit een praktische context.
soft_skills.justification: The company's commitment to helping the candidate grow indicates a focus on learning and development.

soft_skills.phrase: Als Medior Front-End Engineer ontwerp je ook mee als dat in je capaciteiten valt: het is niet alleen uitvoerende taak maar het biedt ook de mogelijkheid om mee te denken
soft_skills.justification: Being able to think along and contribute ideas implies collaboration and communication within the design process.

soft_skills.phrase: Enige kennis van back-end software engineering is meegenomen om de afstemming met de rest van het team soepel te laten verlopen.
soft_skills.justification: Ensuring smooth coordination with the team highlights communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: bent goed op de hoogte van ontwikkelingen in de Front-End Engineering wereld
soft_skills.justification: Staying informed about industry developments is a form of continuous learning.

soft_skills.phrase: kunt meedenken met het vertalen naar onze problematiek.
soft_skills.justification: Thinking along to translate concepts to specific problems involves communication and collaborative problem-solving.

soft_skills.phrase: maar ontwikkel je ook eigen opvattingen over hoe het beter, slimmer, handiger, veiliger schaalbaarder kan.
soft_skills.justification: Developing one's own views on improvement implies a proactive learning and critical thinking approach.
Working with a development team is a clear indicator of collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Nauwwe samenwerking met de rest van het development team
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly states close collaboration with the development team.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on front-end software development tasks, frameworks, and technologies. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or related specialized tasks. The role involves developing and maintaining SaaS products, designing UI/UX, and collaborating with a development team, all of which fall under Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering). Therefore, the profile is 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about the role being a Front-End Engineer. It details the required skills, technologies, and responsibilities, all of which are squarely within the domain of traditional software engineering and do not involve any AI/ML components. This clarity makes the analysis straightforward and highly confident.
